DOC.brief_summary: The objective randomized , control trial determine add protein-calorie supplement ( PCS ) standard treatment tuberculosis ( TB ) HIV improve health outcome . The investigator enroll 180 HIV-positive woman newly diagnose active TB without prior anti-retroviral therapy ( ART ) . At baseline , investigator conduct dietary interview , measure body composition , randomize subject receive PCS ( plus micronutritional supplement [ MNS ] ) control ( MNS ) 6-month duration anti-TB therapy ( ATT ) plus additional 2 mo ( 8 mo total ) . Subjects follow monthly CD4 count baseline , 2 , 8 12 month . At 2 month ( i.e. , end 4 drug intensive phase TB treatment start 2 drug continuation phase ) , subject start anti-retroviral therapy ( ART ) base Tanzanian Ministry Health guideline ( currently : AZT/3TC/efavirenz ) . The primary endpoint change CD4 count 8 month ( i.e. , end PCS/MNS intervention 2 month completion ATT ) .
